participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Alex enjoys solitude and is always looking for ways to connect with nature.
participant_1.background: I have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed. I am far away from my sister and family. I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees! I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people. I drive a van.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Caring and open-minded, Jordan values relationships and is always striving for acceptance from those around him.
participant_2.background: I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am. I check my phone. I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work. I work in retail. I love to start my day with some quiet time to myself.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to start my day with some quiet time to myself. I check my phone and give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I am far away from my sister and family. Do you have any siblings?
Yes, I have a sister. I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
That's good to hear. It can be difficult to come out to family and friends, but it's important to be true to yourself.
It can be. I'm not sure if I'll ever tell them, but I know that they love me regardless.
That's all that matters. I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people. I also like to go hiking and camping with my friends.
That sounds fun! I've never been camping before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely give it a try.
I will! I'm sure I'll have a great time.
